properties.name: EventSourceName
properties.description: If you are creating a partner event bus, this specifies the partner event source that the new event bus will be matched with.

type.description: If you are creating a partner event bus, this specifies the partner event source that the new event bus will be matched with.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the event bus.

type.description: The name of the event bus.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Any tags assigned to the event bus.

properties.name: Policy
properties.description: A JSON string that describes the permission policy statement for the event bus.

types.description: A JSON string that describes the permission policy statement for the event bus.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event bus.
